title: Panel, mid-20th century
medium:
Medium: wild silk
Technique: tabby weave
description: Long brilliant cerise panel, handwoven. Fine magenta warp of light weight wild silk and thick, flossy weft of bright orange. silk is from worm of East Thailand which feeds on scrub oak.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, mid-20th century.Medium: wild silk
Technique: tabby weave. 1960-168-1.
